Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze
  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Maze object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Maze​(java.lang.String fName)
      Creates a new Maze object which is used by MazeGUI and MazeSolver.solveMaze()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze​(java.lang.String fName)
     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new Maze object which is used by MazeGUI and MazeSolver.solveMaze()
        Parameters:
        fName - , the name of the maze .txt file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given fName does not appear to exist

      • getLocation

        public MazeGridLocation getLocation​(int i,
                                    int j)
        Access / read / get / retrieve a MazeGridLocation from this maze
        Parameters:
        i - , specify the row index of the MazeGridLocation
        j - , specify the column index of the MazeGridLocation
        Returns:
        MazeGridLocation, the Location at position (i,j)

      • isVisited

        public boolean isVisited​(MazeGridLocation target)
        Query if the Location matching target has been visited
        Parameters:
        target - , the location to query. This location must be logically equivalent to some location in the Maze (containing the same row and column index numbers)
        Returns:
        boolean, true if the matching location has been visited, false otherwise

      • markVisited

        public void markVisited​(MazeGridLocation target)
        Mark the location matching the provided target as visited
        Parameters:
        target - , the target the location to mark. This location must be logically equivalent to some location in the Maze (containing the same row and column index numbers). The location in the maze will be marked

      • getOpenNeighbors

        public java.util.ArrayList<MazeGridLocation> getOpenNeighbors​(MazeGridLocation target)
        Get a list of locations neighboring the provided target location.
        Parameters:
        target - , the target location which is used to return neighbors of. The method will return a list of neighbors from the maze surrounding the provided target which are (a) not walls and (b) exist in the confines of the maze
        Returns:
        ArrayList, The list of neighbors

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        ToString method
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String, the String representation of the maze
